data.name: Master Pyrox Wizard Smackdown Demo
data.detailed_description:
Master Pyrox, greatest pyromancer of the wizard dimension, is holding a tournament in order to find a new apprentice. Are you good enough to win against your competitors and inherit his legacy? Find out and apply for the Master Pyrox Wizard Smackdown!

Master Pyrox Wizard Smackdown is a fast-paced arcade-style multiplayer game. It's very easy to learn, but difficult to master. Avoid the fireballs that manifest in the center of the screen, knock your opponents down, collect power-ups and cast spells. Up to 8 players can fight against each other in a tournament or cooperate against one of Pyrox's creatures in a boss fight.

The demo version is fully playable, but has fewer arenas, fewer bosses, and some features (level editor, spells, network game etc.) are disabled.

data.short_description: Master Pyrox Wizard Smackdown is a fast-paced arcade-style multiplayer game for up to 8 players. Avoid the fireballs, knock your opponents down, collect power-ups and cast spells. The game offers single player and multiplayer (competitive and co-op) game modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible, 512 MB video RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended display resolution: 1280x720 or higher
